tool_description: Manages patient wait lists for unavailable appointment slots, automatically matching patients with newly available appointments based on preferences and priorities.

action.description: Action to perform: add, remove, check_matches, get_list

patient_phone.description: Patient phone number (required for add action)

preferred_dates.description: List of preferred dates in date-time format

wait_list_id.description: Wait list entry ID (required for remove action)

error_messages: Invalid action: Action must be one of [add, remove, check_matches, get_list]
Missing patient info: patient_name and patient_phone are required for add action
Wait list entry not found: No wait list entry exists with the specified wait_list_id
Invalid provider IDs: One or more preferred_providers do not exist
Invalid date format: preferred_dates must be in ISO 8601 format
Duplicate entry: Patient is already on wait list for this provider/time combination
usage: Specify action and provide required parameters. Use 'add' to put patients on wait list, 'check_matches' to find available appointments, 'remove' to take patients off wait list.

wait_list_id.description: Unique identifier for wait list entry

matched_slots.description: List of available appointment slots that match criteria
